text: Moonilonnu is a 1997 Indian Malayalam film directed by Dr Haridas and starring Ashokan and Deepti Sanjeev Sivan in the lead roles.http://spicyonion.com/title/moonilonnu-malayalam-movie/ ==Cast== * Ashokan as Gopy/ K.Venugopal * Deepti Pillay Sivan as Ambika * Kukku Parameswaran as Kalyani * Durga as Sharada * Jagannadha Varma * RK Nair * Valsala Menon * Ramachandran (New) as Vijayan ==References== ==External links== * Category:1997 films Category:Indian films Category:1990s Malayalam- language films
title: Moonilonnu
